Title: Anuradha
Writer: Rajinder Singh Bedi (dialogue), Sachin Bhowmick (screenplay), Sachin Bhowmick (story), Samir Chowdhury (screenplay), D.N. Mukherjee (screenplay)
Actors: Balraj Sahni, Leela Naidu, Abhi Bhattacharya, Nasir Hussain
Plot: Nirmal Chaudhary becomes a doctor and starts his practice in Nandgaon, a remote village. He meets with Anuradha Roy, a well-known singer and dancer, and they fall in love while he treats her injured ankle. They get married, and re-locate to Nandgaon where Anuradha gives up her singing and becomes a housewife. She soon gives birth to a daughter, Ranu. Ten years later, Anuradha's former beau, Deepak, re-enters her life. He witnesses that she is being neglected by her overly busy husband, and asks her to leave her husband and return back to singing.
